content:
A Funko POP! collection, eh? That's a fun collection to have! Displaying them proudly is a must, and I've got some awesome storage ideas for you. Here are some display cases and shelves that can hold around 20-30 figures:

**Display Cases:**

1. **Funko POP! Display Case by Diamond Select**: This is an official Funko-licensed display case designed specifically for POP! figures. It holds 24 figures and has a sleek, compact design. ($40-$50)
2. **Acrylic Display Case by GeekOn**: This clear acrylic case holds 30 POP! figures and has a sturdy base to prevent toppling. It's a great option for a desk or shelf. ($50-$60)
3. **Pop! Vinyl Display Case by Entertainment Earth**: This case holds 28 figures and features a hinged door for easy access. It's a great value for the price. ($30-$40)

**Shelves:**

1. **Funko POP! Shelf by IRIS USA**: This 3-tier shelf holds 24 POP! figures and has a compact footprint. It's easy to assemble and has a modern design. ($30-$40)
2. **Wooden Display Shelf by WoodWick**: This rustic wooden shelf holds 30 POP! figures and has a unique, handmade design. It's a great option for those who want a more traditional look. ($60-$70)
3. **Stackable Shelf by YouCopia**: This versatile shelf holds 24 POP! figures and can be stacked to create a larger display. It's easy to assemble and has a modern design. ($40-$50)

**Other Options:**

1. **Cube Shelves**: You can use individual cube shelves, like those from IKEA or Amazon, to create a custom display. Simply arrange the cubes to fit your collection.
2. **Detolf Shelves**: These glass shelves from IKEA are popular among collectors. You can use them to create a large display case or separate shelves for your POP! figures.
3. **DIY Shelves**: If you're handy, consider building your own shelves using wood or acrylic. This will give you complete control over the design and size of your display.

Remember to measure your space before choosing a display case or shelf, and consider the size of your POP! figures when selecting a storage solution. Happy collecting!
